posts.name: Yuval
posts.cooked:
Hey, So Up until now We used Timed Robot for All of Our Robots. With that, We do know That the Right way of Coding Is using an ‚ÄúCommannd based‚Äù System Coding.

With all of my Tries, it is Hard to learn Writing in this stystem Using only The Wpilib and there examples.

So What i want to Ask here, Is There Any Good Way To Learn It? for Example using some Youtube Vidoes. what Would you Recommend to a team that some kind of Mastered the Timed robot Coding and Want to Move Up To a new level?

Any help Would Be Appriciated!

posts.name: Jimmy McCosker
posts.cooked: our team has been working on this for a while now, its a compilation of resources to learn topics like this.

posts.name: Angel
posts.cooked:
This video really helps explain command based programming. I found it really helpful when learning to program for FRC.

FRC Ladder is a good resource for FRC programming

FRCLadder is a platform that provides a comprehensive course on robotics programming specifically designed for participants of the FIRST Robotics Competition (FRC). Whether you're a beginner or an experienced programmer, our course covers all the...
